member.name: IConnectionPoint.Advise
member.summary: Establishes a connection between a connection point object and the client's sink.
member.param: A pointer to the interface on the client's advise sink. The client's sink receives outgoing calls from the connection point.

A pointer to a returned token that uniquely identifies this connection. The caller uses this token later to delete the connection by passing it to the method. If the connection was not successfully established, this value is zero.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_OUTOFMEMORY and E_UNEXPECTED, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The connection has been established and *pdwCookie has the connection token.
The value in pUnkSink or pdwCookie is not valid. For example, either pointer may be NULL.
The connection point has already reached its limit of connections and cannot accept any more.
The sink does not support the interface required by this connection point.

member.name: IConnectionPoint.EnumConnections
member.summary: Creates an enumerator object to iterate through the current connections for this connection point.
member.param: A pointer to an interface pointer that receives the newly created enumerator.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_OUTOFMEMORY and E_UNEXPECTED, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The enumerator object was created successfully.
The address in ppEnum is not valid. For example, it may be NULL.
The connection point does not support enumeration.

member.name: IConnectionPoint.GetConnectionInterface
member.summary: Retrieves the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
member.param: A pointer to the identifier of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return value E_UNEXPECTED, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The caller's variable pIID contains the identifier of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
The address in pIID is not valid. For example, it may be NULL.

member.name: IConnectionPoint.GetConnectionPointContainer
member.summary: Retrieves the interface pointer for the parent connectable object.
member.param: A pointer to an interface pointer.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return value E_UNEXPECTED, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The value in ppCPC is not a valid interface pointer. For example, it may be NULL.

member.name: IConnectionPoint.Unadvise
member.summary: Terminates an advisory connection previously established between a connection point object and a client's sink.
member.param: A connection token previously returned from .

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_UNEXPECTED, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The value in dwCookie does not represent a valid connection.

member.name: IConnectionPoint
member.summary: Supports connection points for connectable objects.
